snippet: The Transportation Security Administration is letting some travelers keep their shoes on, why you shrink as you age, more guns were confiscated at airports last year and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.
abstract: The Transportation Security Administration is letting some travelers keep their shoes on, why you shrink as you age, more guns were confiscated at airports last year and other consumer-focused news from The New York Times.

headline.main: Friday Reading: Some Travelers Can Keep Their Shoes On
